Throughout this game, I've aimed to be strategic but fair. I've built genuine connections with many of you while making difficult decisions based on game dynamics. 

I never targeted anyone out of malice, only strategy. When I formed alliances, I honored them as long as possible.

I hope you'll judge me on the entirety of my game - the relationships I built, the moves I made, and the respect I showed each player along the way.
